head.title: The Container Store Opens Its First New York Site

hedline.hl1: The Container Store Opens Its First New York Site

block.p: The Container Store will open its first store in the New York region next month at Westchester Avenue and Bloomingdale Road in White Plains.
Selling products designed to organize and economize space, the store has 21 other stores across the country and projects $237 million in sales for the year.
The Container Store will open its first store in the New York region next month at Westchester Avenue and Bloomingdale Road in White Plains.
Selling products designed to organize and economize space, the store has 21 other stores across the country and projects $237 million in sales for the year.
During the two-day grand opening starting Oct. 21, the store will give 10 percent of its proceeds to the Westchester Arts Council.
